exercise.title: Decimal Division

p.i: Now we try out how decimal division works. See how many decimals the system includes in the quotient. ('quotient' = the number that results when one number is divided by another).

exercise.p: Define the following two variables: a and b. Assign 4.87 to a and 5.03 to b. After that, write the quotient of a and b into the browser console.
Submit a link to your code (myy or jsbin).
